text: “Gumazitam uan bulmakauba ateghtɨ da mangɨ an nguazim ko an wainɨn azenimɨn tintinibar daru damɨva, mɨtaghniamɨn ikiavkɨnigh gumazir igharazimɨn azenimɨn daghebar ameghtɨ, bulmakaubar ghuavim uan azenimɨn dagher aghuariba da ikarvagham. Egh uaghan wainɨn ovɨziba gumazir kam ikarvagh a danɨngam.22:5 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
